sn26.9:1.2: “Yo kho, bhikkhave, pathavidhatuya uppado thiti abhinibbatti patubhavo …pe… jaramaranassa patubhavo;
sn26.9:1.7: yo vinnanadhatuya uppado thiti abhinibbatti patubhavo, dukkhasseso uppado, roganam thiti, jaramaranassa patubhavo.
sn26.9:1.8: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, pathavidhatuya nirodho …pe… jaramaranassa atthangamo;
sn26.9:1.13: yo vinnanadhatuya nirodho vupasamo atthangamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, roganam vupasamo, jaramaranassa atthangamo”ti.
